Changeset.Change: moved to common subsystem
porting to featherweight stack
removed the ASL dependency
Added gCubeItems
Added application folder
Moved to java 7
Added ACLs
Added groups, users and privileges manager
Added trash folder
Added locks in: unshare, move, remove and share operation.
Removed clones in unshare and remove operations.
Added a default preview used when the original one is not available.
Moved from the "home-library" user to the real username to call the StorageManager library (for accounting).
Reduced calls to StorageManager library in upload operation, using tmp files
Removed clones when a shared folder is removed from the workspace
Added a private copy of an ex-shared folder for owner and administrators
Added search by properties for gCube items.
Added id to trash items
Fixed bug updating a shared file
Added searchFullText method to Workspace
Better performance
Added progress number to filename when a file with the same name already exists
